chapter.text: 83|1|alavil mocati ceypavarkalukkuk ketutan
83|2|avarkal manitarkalitam alantu vankinal, niraiya alantu kolkinranar
83|3|marravarkalukku avarkal alantu kotuttalum allatu niruttuk kotuttalum kuraittu (avarkalai nastappatutti) vitukinranar
83|4|makattana oru nalil, niccayamaka avarkal (uyir kotuttu) eluppappatuvarkal enpatai avarkal nampavillaiya
83|5|makattana oru nalil, niccayamaka avarkal (uyir kotuttu) eluppappatuvarkal enpatai avarkal nampavillaiya
83|6|annalil, manitarkal anaivarume ulakattarin iraivan mun (vicaranaikkaka) ninru kontirupparkal
83|7|niccayamaka pavikalin pativetu (narakattin) ciraikkutattil irukkum
83|8|(napiye!) Acciraikkutattin pativettai nir arivira
83|9|atu oru pativupputtakam (tantikkappata ventiyavarkalin peyarkal ellam) atil patiyappattirukkum
83|10|(Itaip) poyyakkupavarkalukku annalil ketutan
83|11|avarkal (itai mattuma poyyakkukinranar?) Kuli kotukkum nalaiyum poyyakkukinranar
83|12|varampumiriya paviyait tavira (marrevarum) ataip poyyakka mattan
83|13|avanukku nam vacanankal otik kanpikkappattal, itu munnullorin kattukkataikal tan enru kurukiran
83|14|niccayamaka avvaralla. Avarkal ceytu kontirunta tiya ceyalkale avarkalin ullankal mitu (turuvakappatintu) mutik kontana. (Atalaltan, ivvaru kurukinranar)
83|15|avvaralla. (Vicaranaikkakak kontu varappatum) annalil niccayamaka ivarkal tankal iraivanai vittum tatukkappattu vituvarkal
83|16|pinnar, niccayamaka ivarkal narakattil nulaivarkal
83|17|pinnar, (ivarkalai nokki) ‘‘ninkal poyyakkik kontiruntatu itutan'' enru kurappatum
83|18|avvaralla! Niccayamaka nanmai ceytavarkalin pativetu ‘‘illiyyun' enra (melana) itattil irukkum
83|19|(napiye!) ‘Illiyyun' ennum (melana) itattil irukkum pativetu ennavenru nir arivira
83|20|atu oru pativup puttakam. Atil (nallavarkalin peyarkalellam) patiyappattirukkum
83|21|‘mukarrap' (irainerukkattirkuriya) vanavarkal atai(k kattu)p parttukkontu irukkinranar
83|22|akave, niccayamaka nallavarkal (annalil) inpam nirainta corkkattil
83|23|uyarnta kattilkal mitu (caynta vannam corkkattin katcikalaip) parttuk kontirupparkal
83|24|avarkal mukankalil avarkalin cukavacattin celippai (napiye!) Nir arintu kolvir
83|25|muttiraiyitappattirukkum kalapparra tiratcai racam avarkalukkup pukattappatum
83|26|Atu kasturiyal muttiraiyitappattirukkum. (Panattai) acai kolla virumpuvor ataiye acai kollavum
83|27|atil ‘tasnim' enra (vatikattiya) panamum kalantirukkum
83|28|(tasnim enpatu allahvukkuc) camipamanavarkal aruntuvatarkena erpatta oru (cirappana) cunaiyin nirakum
83|29|niccayamaka kurravalikalo (inru) nampikkai kontavarkalaik kantu (elanamakac) cirikkinranar
83|30|avarkalin camipamakac cenral, (parikacamakat tankalukkul) oruvarukkoruvar kan jataiyum kattikkolkinranar
83|31|(avarkalai vittum vilakit) tankal kutumpattarkalitam cenru vittapotilum, ivarkalutaiya visayankalaiye (parikacamakap peci) makilcciyataikinranar
83|32|(valiyil) ivarkalaik kantal (ivarkalaic cuttik kanpittu) ‘‘niccayamaka ivarkal valikettup ponarkal'' enrum kurukinranar
83|33|(nampikkaiyalarkalaip parri etarkaka ivarkal ivvalavu kavalaippatukinranar?) Ivarkal avarkal mitu patukappalarkalaka anuppappatavillaiye
83|34|eninum, (marumai nalakiya) inraiya tinam nampikkai kontavarkal annirakarippavarkalaik kantu cirikkinranar
83|35|(corkkattilulla ciranta) irukkaikal mitu (caynta vannam) iruntu kontu, intap pavikal patum vetanaiyaip) parttukkontu
83|36|(marumaiyai) nirakaritta ivarkalukku, ivarkalutaiya ceyalukkuttakka kuli kotukkappattata? (Enrum ketparkal)
